title: Compute the maximum water trapped by a pair of vertical lines
hint: Start with 0 and n-1 and work your way in.
problem:
An array of integers naturally defines a set of lines parallel to the Y-axis, starting from x = 0 as illustrated in Figure <IMAGE HERE>. The goal of this prblem is to find the pair of lines that together with th X-axis "trap" the most water.

Write a program which takes as input an integer array and returns the pair of entries that trap the maximum amount of water.
